While reading a most interesting article about modern day pirates, I noticed that the Smithsonian’s CultureFest is currently featuring Louisiana! I had a blast while for Dave and Desiree’s wedding, and I hope to return in the near future. If you haven’t been to Louisiana, head over and readabout it (try Cajun Country, I hear its a good place to be ), and if you’re feeling lucky enter the sweepstakes to win a trip at the end of October.
